editAllowedReferrers(address,bool).details: referrers are checked in create function of generator

params._allow: bool if the referrer should be added to (=true) or removed from (=false) the list
params._referrer: address of the referrer to be changed

params._allow: bool if the token should be added to (=true) or removed from (=false) the list
params._holdAmount: the minimum amount of early acces token hold by user for early access
params._token: address of the token to be changed for early access

params._index: position of the early access token in the EARLY_ACCESS_TOKENS set
position of the referrer in the ALLOWED_REFERRERS set

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._baseFeeReceiver: address of the base token fee receiver
params._tokenFeeReceiver: address of the sale token fee receiver

params._creationFee: absolute fee in BNB charged on launchpad creation
params._referralFee: relative fee charged on base and sale tokens fee in parts per 1000
params._tokenFee: relative fee charged on base and sale tokens in parts per 1000

params._maxLength: duration in seconds (difference between start and end time)

params._round1Length: the duration of round 1 in seconds

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

userHoldsSufficientRound1Token(address).details: we are aware of out of gas scenarios in for loop. It is intended to keep the early access tokens list very small (max. 5)

params._user: address of the user to be checked

allowedReferrersLength().notice: returns total amount of allowed referrers

earlyAccessTokensLength().notice: returns total amount registered early access tokens

editAllowedReferrers(address,bool).notice: edits the list of allowed referrers by owner. Referrers can be added to or removed from the allowed referrers list.

editEarlyAccessTokens(address,uint256,bo.notice: edits the list of early access tokens by owner.

getBaseFeeReceiver().notice: returns the address of the base fee receiver

getEarlyAccessTokenAtIndex(uint256).notice: returns the address and holding amount of the early access token at given index

getGlmrCreationFee().notice: returns the absolute fee in BNB for launchpad creation

getMaxLaunchpadLength().notice: returns the maximum duration of a launchpad in seconds

getMinLockingDuration().notice: gets the minimum duration of locking lp tockens

getReferralFee().notice: returns the relative referral fee charged on base and sale token fee in parts per 1000

getReferrerAtIndex(uint256).notice: returns the address of the referrer at a given index

getRound1Length().notice: returns the duration of round 1 in seconds

getSaleFeeReceiver().notice: returns the sale token fee receiver address

getTokenFee().notice: returns the relative sale token fee in parts per 1000

referrerIsValid(address).notice: returns if a given referrer is valid

setFeeAddresses(address,address).notice: sets the fee receiver addresses for base token and sale token fees

setFees(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: sets the fees for the launchpad by owner

setMaxLaunchpadLength(uint256).notice: sets the maximum duration of a launchpad by owner

setMinLockingDuration(uint256).notice: sets the minimum duration of locking lp tockens

setRound1Length(uint256).notice: set the duration of round 1 by owner

userHoldsSufficientRound1Token(address).notice: returns if a given user has sufficient balance of early access tokens registered in the EARLY_ACCESS_TOKENS set to participate in round 1
